Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Annotation Types
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    picocli.CommandLine.IExceptionHandler
    see CommandLine.execute(String...), CommandLine.IParameterExceptionHandler and CommandLine.IExecutionExceptionHandler
    picocli.CommandLine.IExceptionHandler2
    see CommandLine.execute(String...), CommandLine.IParameterExceptionHandler and CommandLine.IExecutionExceptionHandler
    picocli.CommandLine.IHelpCommandInitializable
    use CommandLine.IHelpCommandInitializable2 instead
    picocli.CommandLine.IParseResultHandler
    Use CommandLine.IExecutionStrategy instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.IParseResultHandler2
    use CommandLine.IExecutionStrategy instead, see CommandLine.execute(String...)
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    picocli.CommandLine.AbstractHandler
    see CommandLine.execute(String...)
    picocli.CommandLine.AbstractParseResultHandler
    see CommandLine.execute(String...), CommandLine.getExecutionStrategy(), CommandLine.getParameterExceptionHandler(), CommandLine.getExecutionExceptionHandler()
    picocli.CommandLine.DefaultExceptionHandler
    see CommandLine.execute(String...), CommandLine.getParameterExceptionHandler() and CommandLine.getExecutionExceptionHandler()
    picocli.groovy.PicocliBaseScript
    Use PicocliBaseScript2 instead.
  • Annotation Types 
    Annotation Type Description
    picocli.groovy.PicocliScript
    Use PicocliScript2 instead.
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    picocli.CommandLine.Range.isVariable
    use CommandLine.Range.isVariable() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Range.max
    use CommandLine.Range.max() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Range.min
    use CommandLine.Range.min() instead
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    picocli.CommandLine.AbstractHandler.andExit​(int)
    use CommandLine.execute(String...) instead, and call System.exit() in the application.
    picocli.CommandLine.AbstractHandler.ansi()
    use CommandLine.AbstractHandler.colorScheme() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.AbstractHandler.useAnsi​(CommandLine.Help.Ansi)
    use CommandLine.setColorScheme(Help.ColorScheme) and CommandLine.execute(String...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.AbstractHandler.useErr​(PrintStream)
    use CommandLine.setErr(PrintWriter) and CommandLine.execute(String...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.AbstractHandler.useOut​(PrintStream)
    use CommandLine.setOut(PrintWriter) and CommandLine.execute(String...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.call​(C, String...)
    use CommandLine.execute(String...) and CommandLine.getExecutionResult() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.addSubcommand​(String, Object)
    use CommandLine.Help.addAllSubcommands(Map) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.Ansi.apply​(String, List<CommandLine.Help.Ansi.IStyle>)
    use CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme.apply(String, List) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.Ansi.Text.append​(String)
    use CommandLine.Help.Ansi.Text.concat(String) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.detailedSynopsis​(Comparator<CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec>, boolean)
    use CommandLine.Help.detailedSynopsis(int, Comparator, boolean) instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.join​(CommandLine.Help.Ansi, int, String[], StringBuilder, Object...)
    Use CommandLine.Help.join(Ansi, int, boolean, String[], StringBuilder, Object...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.synopsis()
    use CommandLine.Help.synopsis(int) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.TextTable.cellAt​(int, int)
    use CommandLine.Help.TextTable.textAt(int, int) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.TextTable.forColumns​(CommandLine.Help.Ansi, CommandLine.Help.Column...)
    use CommandLine.Help.TextTable.forColumns(CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme, CommandLine.Help.Column...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.TextTable.forColumnWidths​(CommandLine.Help.Ansi, int...)
    use CommandLine.Help.TextTable.forColumns(CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme, CommandLine.Help.Column...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.TextTable.forDefaultColumns​(CommandLine.Help.Ansi, int)
    use CommandLine.Help.TextTable.forDefaultColumns(CommandLine.Help.Ansi, int, int) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.HelpCommand.init​(CommandLine, CommandLine.Help.Ansi, PrintStream, PrintStream)
    picocli.CommandLine.IHelpCommandInitializable.init​(CommandLine, CommandLine.Help.Ansi, PrintStream, PrintStream)
    picocli.CommandLine.invoke​(String, Class<?>, String...)
    use CommandLine.execute(String...) and CommandLine.getExecutionResult() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.isSplitQuotedStrings()
    Most applications should not change the default. The rare application that does need to split parameter values without respecting quotes should use CommandLine.Model.ParserSpec.splitQuotedStrings(boolean).
    picocli.CommandLine.Model.ArgSpec.renderedDescription()
    Use CommandLine.Model.ArgSpec.description() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Model.ArgSpec.setValue​(T, CommandLine)
    use CommandLine.Model.ArgSpec.setValue(Object) instead. This was a design mistake.
    picocli.CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.Builder.help()
    Use CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.Builder.usageHelp() and CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.Builder.versionHelp() instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.help()
    Use CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.usageHelp() and CommandLine.Model.OptionSpec.versionHelp() instead.
    picocli.CommandLine.parse​(String...)
    use CommandLine.parseArgs(String...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.parseWithHandler​(CommandLine.IParseResultHandler, PrintStream, String...)
    use CommandLine.execute(String...) and CommandLine.getExecutionResult() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.parseWithHandlers​(CommandLine.IParseResultHandler, PrintStream, CommandLine.Help.Ansi, CommandLine.IExceptionHandler, String...)
    use CommandLine.execute(String...) and CommandLine.getExecutionResult() instead
    picocli.CommandLine.printHelpIfRequested​(List<CommandLine>, PrintStream, CommandLine.Help.Ansi)
    use CommandLine.printHelpIfRequested(ParseResult) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.Range.defaultArity​(Class<?>)
    use CommandLine.Range.defaultArity(Field) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.run​(R, String...)
    use CommandLine.execute(String...) instead
    picocli.CommandLine.setSplitQuotedStrings​(boolean)
    Most applications should not change the default. The rare application that does need to split parameter values without respecting quotes should use CommandLine.Model.ParserSpec.splitQuotedStrings(boolean).
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    picocli.CommandLine.Help​(Object, CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme)
    use Help(picocli.CommandLine.Model.CommandSpec, picocli.CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme)
    picocli.CommandLine.Help.TextTable​(CommandLine.Help.Ansi, CommandLine.Help.Column[])
    use TextTable(picocli.CommandLine.Help.ColorScheme, picocli.CommandLine.Help.Column[]) instead
